proposal.objective: Align the database schema with the models defined in the Django application.

steps.action: Examine the PeriodTemplate and PeriodContent models to ensure they are correctly defined and aligned with the intended database schema.
Check the existing migration files for any inconsistencies or errors that may be causing the makemigrations process to fail.
If necessary, recreate the migration files to ensure they accurately reflect the desired changes to the database schema.

proposal.results: No changes detected during makemigrations, indicating that the current model definitions and migration files are consistent with the database schema.
